name: Pale Tincture
description: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) Poison damage and have the Poisoned condition. The Poisoned creature repeats the saving throw every 24 hours, taking 3 (1d6) Poison damage on a failed save. Until the poison ends, the damage can't be healed by any means. After seven successful saving throws, the effect ends and the creature can heal normally.
